caller_intent: Confirm the due date and amount for a policy renewal premium increase of $62, and verify the total renewal amount of $4,396.
resolution_steps: Agent accessed the carrier portal to verify policy details.
Confirmed the renewal premium amount ($4,396) and due date (November 25th).
Notified caller of the need to pay by November 25th to avoid lapse.
Offered assistance with payment arrangements and mailing address for check.
knowledge_required: Carrier portal access and verification procedures
summary: Todd Frack confirmed receipt of conditional renewal notices and inquired about a $62 premium increase. The agent verified the total renewal amount ($4,396) and due date (November 25th) via the carrier portal. The caller agreed to pay by the deadline and will send a check, with the agent offering further payment assistance.
